La Ruta de la Seda

Freelance - Feb-2019

"La Ruta de la Seda" is a silk boutique in Costa Rica. The store focuses not only on importing the best quality of silk, but also on providing workshops around art and Asian culture. I was commisioned to design and create their new brand identity.

SKILLS

Design & Branding, Illustration


Tools

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop


Conceptualization


For the brand, I wanted to create something that resembled the cultural richness of the store and its connection to Asian culture, specifically the Thai and Indian cultures. Taking into consideration that with each purchase, the customer receives a leaf of the Bodhi tree, I wanted to use the leaf as a visual asset.


Logo


My main goal with every photograph that we took was to include the main concept of the brand: quality, happiness and respect for nature. For this we worked alongside the hand-pickers and the staff to create a series of portraits and product shots while the coffee was being picked and delivered for the toasting process.

Color


A very important aspect of the brand is its playfulness. For this we decided that illustrations and GIFs would be a perfect medium to communicate simple ideas in our social platforms.

Font


My main goal with every photograph that we took was to include the main concept of the brand: quality, happiness and respect for nature. For this we worked alongside the hand-pickers and the staff to create a series of portraits and product shots while the coffee was being picked and delivered for the toasting process.
